name: role
description: Manage your opt-in roles or equip a color

options.name: add
options.description: Give yourself a role. For a list of all assignable roles, set list to true

options.name: role
options.description: The role to add (input random if setting list to true)

options.name: list
options.description: Get a list of all self-assignable roles

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a self-assignable role. For a list of roles you can remove, set list to true

options.name: role
options.description: The role to remove (input random if setting list to true)

options.name: list
options.description: Get a list of all the roles you can remove

options.name: inventory
options.description: Get a list of all color roles you can equip

options.name: equip
options.description: Equip a role's color. Use /role inventory to get a list of available roles.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to equip. Leave blank to unequip any color roles

options.name: adulting
options.description: [MOD] Give or remove someone from the adulting role

options.name: user
options.description: The user to remove from the adulting role

options.name: remove
options.description: Whether or not to remove the user from the adulting role

options.name: id
options.description: Get the ID of a role

options.name: whohas
options.description: Get a list of people who have a role
